rules.name: Templar Vows
rules.lore: On the eve of battle, the warriors of a Black Templars crusade gather together to be led in prayer and contemplation by their Chaplains. In their righteous zeal, united in their hatred of the foe, they swear a mighty vow to uphold in the battle ahead.
rules.text: At the start of the first battle round, select one of the four Templar Vows belwo to be active for your +Adeptus Astartes+ units until the end of the battle.

options.name: Suffer Not the Unclean to Live
options.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units' melee weapons have +[Lethal Hits]+.

options.name: Uphold the Honor of the Emperor
options.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units have !Feel No Pain 6+! and a 5+ Leadership trait.

options.name: Abhor the Witch
options.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units have a 4+ Invulnerable Save against +[Psychic]+ attacks, and your melee weapons have ![Anti-Psyker 4+]!.

options.name: Accept Any Challenge
options.text: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units' melee weapons have +[Sustained Hits 1]+.

strategems.name: Fervent Acclamation
strategems.when: At the start of a Battle Round
strategems.target: One +Adeptus Astartes+ +Character+ +Leader+ model from your army
strategems.effect: Select one Templar Vow that is not active for your army. Until the end of the Battle Round, while the selected +Character+ is leading a unit, that unit gains the benefits of the selected Templar Vow, in addition to the effects of the Templar Vow selected at the start of the battle.

strategems.name: No Escape
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back (excluding +Vehicle+ and +Monster+ units)
strategems.effect: Roll d6. On a 4+, the enemy unit may not Fall Back, and must instead remain stationary. The opponent may use the Desperate Breakout strategem to move anyways; if they do, all models in the enemy unit will be considered to have "moved through an enemy model" for the purposes of that strategem.

upgrades.name: Student of the Codex
upgrades.text: At the start of the battle, gain 1 CP.

upgrades.name: Fervent Crusaders
upgrades.text: At the start of the battle, select a second Templar Vow. It applies only to your +Warlord+ (and their attached unit, if any). Your +Warlord+ may not be targed with the Fervent Acclamation strategem.
